channel.title: Using Prima's iClarity Client with Devo 2.7
channel.description:
I get this error on login:
[code]
This Client was Created by Prima. Read Error: ./Sprites/prayeroff3_0.dat java.lang.NullPointerException at java.awt.Toolkit.createImage(Toolkit.java:1088) at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:15) at Class9.drawSprite(Class9.java:1786) at Class9.getPrayer(Class9.java:1411) at Class9.method205(Class9.java:1250) at client.method6(client.java:7115) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4400) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Loaded prayeroff3_0.dat Read Error: ./Sprites/prayeron3_0.dat java.lang.NullPointerException at java.awt.Toolkit.createImage(Toolkit.java:1088) at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:15) at Class9.drawSprite(Class9.java:1786) at Class9.getPrayer(Class9.java:1414) at Class9.method205(Class9.java:1250) at client.method6(client.java:7115) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4400) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Loaded prayeron3_0.dat Read Error: ./Sprites/prayeroff3_1.dat java.lang.NullPointerException at java.awt.Toolkit.createImage(Toolkit.java:1088) at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:15) at Class9.drawSprite(Class9.java:1786) at Class9.getPrayer(Class9.java:1555) at Class9.method205(Class9.java:1250) at client.method6(client.java:7115) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4400) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Loaded prayeroff3_1.dat Read Error: ./Sprites/prayeron3_1.dat java.lang.NullPointerException at java.awt.Toolkit.createImage(Toolkit.java:1088) at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:15) at Class9.drawSprite(Class9.java:1786) at Class9.getPrayer(Class9.java:1558) at Class9.method205(Class9.java:1250) at client.method6(client.java:7115) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4400) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Loaded prayeron3_1.dat Read Error: ./cache/interfaces/Pp 7.png java.lang.NullPointerException at java.awt.Toolkit.createImage(Toolkit.java:1088) at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:15) at Class9.Options(Class9.java:2267) at Class9.custom(Class9.java:2300) at Class9.method205(Class9.java:1254) at client.method6(client.java:7115) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4400) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Read Error: ./cache/interfaces/Pp 8.png java.lang.NullPointerException at java.awt.Toolkit.createImage(Toolkit.java:1088) at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:15) at Class9.Options(Class9.java:2267) at Class9.custom(Class9.java:2321) at Class9.method205(Class9.java:1254) at client.method6(client.java:7115) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4400) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Read Error: ./cache/interfaces/Pp 9.png java.lang.NullPointerException at java.awt.Toolkit.createImage(Toolkit.java:1088) at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:15) at Class9.Options(Class9.java:2267) at Class9.custom(Class9.java:2489) at Class9.method205(Class9.java:1254) at client.method6(client.java:7115) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4400) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Read Error: ./cache/interfaces/Pp 4.png java.lang.NullPointerException at java.awt.Toolkit.createImage(Toolkit.java:1088) at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:15) at Class9.Options(Class9.java:2267) at Class9.custom(Class9.java:2510) at Class9.method205(Class9.java:1254) at client.method6(client.java:7115) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4400) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Read Error: ./cache/interfaces/Pp 2.png java.lang.NullPointerException at java.awt.Toolkit.createImage(Toolkit.java:1088) at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.<init>(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java:15) at Class9.Options(Class9.java:2267) at Class9.custom(Class9.java:2532) at Class9.method205(Class9.java:1254) at client.method6(client.java:7115) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:47) at client.run(client.java:4400) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
[/code]
I know the server isn't accepting the interfaces, how do I make it work?

item.title: Using Prima's iClarity Client with Devo 2.7
item.dc:creator: @iTanq iTanq

Itâ€™s ./Sprites/420

item.title: Using Prima's iClarity Client with Devo 2.7
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Client side, as CoonHunter said.

Just check if the sprites folder has anything in it, because uh, this looks a bit dodgy.

Read Error: ./Sprites/prayeroff3_0.dat

Reading from a dat file?

Read full topic
item.source: Using Prima's iClarity Client with Devo 2.7

@iTanq wrote:

So put the blank 30x30 in /sprites?

item.title: Using Prima's iClarity Client with Devo 2.7
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

This wouldnt be the server, if im right. Make a blank 30x30 image, and put it where that image is being called. That should fix that issue.

Read full topic
item.source: Using Prima's iClarity Client with Devo 2.7
